item.title: brew and macvim
item.description:
there might be problem when you try to use brew install macvim if you already have conda python installed. It is because the installation of macvim via brew requires framework python.

So in order to install macvim, and upgrade macvim:

  1. Open a new terminal and run export PATH=/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/bin:$PATH, but don’t put this line in your .bashrc or .zshrc.

  2. brew install macvim or brew upgrade macvim

  3. close the terminal, so your $PATH will restore to default.
